snippet: In the latest Intersection video, we head to Dumbo, Brooklyn and met people that work in the area, who draw their style inspiration from music festivals and furniture design.
abstract: In the latest Intersection video, we head to Dumbo, Brooklyn and met people that work in the area, who draw their style inspiration from music festivals and furniture design.

byline.original: By JOANNA NIKAS, SIMONE S. OLIVER, FRITZIE ANDRADE
